definition: Jiang Wen (1963-), sixth generation Chinese movie director
heroine of Qin dynasty 秦朝 folk tale, who searched for her husband, and whose tears broke down a stretch of the Great Wall to reveal his body

Jiang Ziya (c. 1100 BC, dates of birth and death unknown), partly mythical sage advisor to King Wen of Zhou 周文王[Zhou1 Wen2 wang2] and purported author of “Six Secret Strategic Teachings” 六韜|六韬[Liu4 tao1], one of the Seven Military Classics of ancient China 武經七書|武经七书[Wu3 jing1 Qi1 shu1]
Jiangyan county level city in Taizhou 泰州[Tai4 zhou1], Jiangsu
Jiangyan county level city in Taizhou 泰州[Tai4 zhou1], Jiangsu
see Jiang Ziya 姜子牙[Jiang1 Zi3 ya2]
Jiang Ziya is fishing, if you want it, take the hook (idiom, refers to early sage 姜子牙 fishing with no bait and the hook above the water); to put one's head in the noose
pinyin: Jiang1 tai4 gong1 diao4 yu2 , yuan4 zhe3 shang4 gou1

sentences.english: Ginger has powerful anti-inflammatory properties and can slow cancer growth. Turmeric, the spice that forms the base of most curries, is from a root in the ginger family.
sentences.chinese: 姜具有强大的抗炎功能，能减缓肿瘤的生长。

sentences.english: She poured too vigorously and half the gingerale foamed away.
sentences.chinese: 她倒得太猛，一半的姜汽水冒泡溢出。

sentences.english: The accompanying ginger and plainly cooked broccoli also help offset the fat.
sentences.chinese: 配着的姜和简单烧过的西兰花菜也帮助抵消脂肪。

sentences.english: Ginger and turmeric are about as close as you can get to good-tasting medicine.
sentences.chinese: 姜和姜黄大概是味道最好的药物。

sentences.english: Jiang Chunyang and Liu Lan witnessed their son's changes and felt heartbroken.
sentences.chinese: 姜春阳和刘兰都看到了儿子的变化，很心疼。

sentences.english: Ginger professor says, that sex is an important part of a happy marriage.
sentences.chinese: 姜教授认为，其实性是幸福婚姻的重要部分。

sentences.english: Ginger bacterial wilt is a destructive disease caused by Pseudomonas solanacarum (Smith) Smith.
sentences.chinese: 姜瘟病是一种由青枯假单胞菌引起的生姜毁灭性病害。

sentences.english: Mr. Jiang Xingfa, a famous Beijing Opera actor, is invited to give us an introduction to the art of Beijing opera.
sentences.chinese: 我们邀请到著名京剧演员姜兴发老师讲授京剧艺术。

sentences.english: Qiang ginger and to win with Hokkaido, but though two fang Buddha become two strangers.
sentences.chinese: 羌姜与至嬴虽同在北海道，但二人彷佛成为陌路人。

sentences.english: It looks like gingers to me.
Objective To study the effect of different extraction parts from Xiongjiang Decoction (XD) on promoting uterine muscle contraction (UMC).
sentences.chinese: 目的分析芎姜复方不同提取部位的缩宫作用。

sentences.english: Girls enjoy the clean water from the new water points in Tianfala.
sentences.chinese: 姜法拉的一个新取水点，女孩们正在享用清洁的水源。

sentences.english: Not behind closed doors, and so on with Initiative and Jiang Kui.
sentences.chinese: 闭门不出，与姜夔等相倡和。

sentences.english: Ginger is one of the first words she learned.
Ginger bacterial wilt is a destructive disease caused by Ralstonia solanacearum.
sentences.chinese: 姜瘟病是一种由青枯劳尔氏菌引起的生姜毁灭性病害。

sentences.english: Pickled ginger is at once sweet, tart, and salty. It is served with Japanese sushi.
sentences.chinese: 甜酸带咸的腌姜，是日本寿司的好搭配。

definition: fourth of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/fourth in order/letter "D" or Roman "IV" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/ancient Chinese compass point: 195°/butyl/cubes (of food)
